attributes.action: Add an Abstain Option to All Voting Papers
attributes.additional_details:
The voting turnout in the UK has been decreasing over the years. People have lost faith in politicians, some people wreck their ballot paper so that it becomes void, others just don't go to vote.

I believe that everyone who is eligible should vote, however I have found myself looking at Ballot Papers and thinking is there anyone worth voting for?

If an Abstain Option was added then voters could use this if they were not happy with the candidates on the Ballot paper, these should also be counted as if they were for candidates. Hopefully this would then allow politicians to work out what needs doing to get people interested in candidates and policies for future elections.
attributes.background: I would like an Abstain Option added to ALL Election or Referendum voting papers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637099
